scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a golden halo, is seated and cradling the Christ Child, who is also haloed. She wears a vibrant blue robe. To her left, an angel with wings and a white robe plays a long pipe. To her right, another angel, similarly winged and robed, plays a lute. They are positioned within an architectural setting that features golden, ornate structures with arched openings and decorative elements. The background behind the Virgin and Child is a rich red tapestry with gold ornamentation. The scene is framed by decorative borders with floral motifs.
